name: maven-snapshots-hosted
content:
import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager
import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy
import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.LayoutPolicy
import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.VersionPolicy
def name='maven-snapshots-hosted'
if(!repository.getRepositoryManager().exists(name)) { repository.createMavenHosted(name, BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME, false, VersionPolicy.SNAPSHOT, WritePolicy.ALLOW, LayoutPolicy.STRICT) }
